phrases: It is already been a month since school started.
Hina-chan, have you gotten used to school?
Yes, it is a lot of fun!
Our theater society is still going on, too.
I still do not do well in front of people, though...
But I have you, Mayu-chan, Kuu-chan, and our landlady, too.
Okay, we will begin our full practice in five minutes.
Make sure you all do your warm-ups.
Why is there a child in the club room?
Come to think of it, she is been coming here for a few days.
None of the other members have said anything...
Actually, it seems like they have been practicing a lot harder these past few days...
The landlady seems that way, too.
Since she is standing next to the landlady, could she be...
She is not the landlady's daughter, is she?!
How old would she have been when she had her?!
You really do not know who that is?
You know who that girl is?
She is Kuroyanagi Ruriko, a famous child actress!
You have never seen her on TV?
We only had three channels back home.
I guess you cannot help that.
but her acting rivals that of any adult.
She is a super celebrity said to come along only once every century!
The contrast between her cool personality and passionate acting is part of her charm!
Were you even listening to me?!
(Woman)Countess: Now, why do not we sing?
To enjoy this night, this moment, the present.
Is not that what people do?
-The countess looks around, giving Pino a menacing glare (Man)Pino:
But there is no heart here.
How are we supposed to sing without heart?
How are we supposed to enjoy that?
-Trio flinches slightly, but manages a word (Woman)Countess:
I cannot see it at all.
You say something that does not exist, exists, and something that does exist, actually does not.
You are quite difficult, are not you?
-Countess, while giving a mysterious smile (Woman)Countess: Right now...
There is no way there could be.
I am here as a special instructor to serve as this club's advisor.
I returned to Japan recently after completing my theater training.
Does that mean she is the advisor we heard about?
Which means it is her fault the theater club was forced into hiatus, right?
I cast aside my job as this theater club's advisor.
At that time, I was beginning to lose my confidence and motivation
to teach and guide all of you as your advisor.
Hard to believe she is nine years old.
So I went overseas to learn theater from square one.
The Palais Garnier, La Scala, the Vienna State Opera...
I visited theaters in many countries, and met many people.
I learned what is most important as both an actor and a teacher.
And so, I returned to Japan.
Now is the time to show the fruits of my training.
In this theater club's performance at the upcoming culture festival.
After you went all the way to Europe to train?
I went there to train as an advisor, and nothing more.
The culture festival is in one month, right?
Oh, so the club's advisor is back?
So it will go back to being the theater club again?
She said she had some things to think about,
so she wants it to remain a society for the culture festival.
But the members must be really psyched up, right?
I would love to see Hina-chan and the Kuu-chan practicing!
She practices in her room every day, right?
Like her vocal practices with Kuu-chan.
I know she is working hard,
so I want to see the results of that firsthand.
Sh-She is not getting it at all.
Hina-chan... you were able to do it at home...
There are so many club members, it makes me nervous...
You know how they say to imagine people as vegetables when you are nervous?
Should not you use these steps for this song?
Mayu-chan, you are such a good dancer!
A girl as cute as you will become a star in no time!
I-I am not good at that sort of... I mean... um...
I know you are all practicing, but please stop for a moment.
There is something I would like all of you to hear.
The advisor has something to say!
Walking home on a starry night
All alone, I start to cry
I will softly wipe my tears away,
Then look up at the light and start walking
My eyes, when they begin to sparkle,
Yes, born to make my dream shine!
Hina-chan, you are a great singer!
Maybe it is because I always sang
La, la, la, la to call red foxes back home?
What part of the country did Hina-chan come from?
Here is your black tea and coffee.
Thanks for helping me this morning, Hina-chan.
As a resident of Hitotose Manor, I need to work, too.
We do not have many customers yet.
You do not have to work so hard.
I think we should have some more around lunch time.
Hey, are you free right now?
Want to go get ice cream from the place by the station?
Sorry... I am going to a play.
I finally grabbed an empty seat.
You should hang out with me sometimes!
Which is more important to you, me or theater?
Take care of the coffee shop for me, okay?
Okay, I will be going now.
We had more lunch customers than usual.
You were a big help, Hina-chan.
I thought maybe you wanted attention!
Do not treat me like a baby!
Did you want to spend time with the landlady today?
Then you should have just gone to the play with her.
And I guess you cannot leave me in charge, huh?
I am not interested in theater, anyway.
Besides, the small theater troupe Aki-chan went to see today
And their lead actress always acts so realistically
that a lot of people say they cannot sleep the night after seeing her.
Wow, you know a lot about it, huh, Mayu-chan?
I just got curious and looked into it a little!
Is not that what they call being interested?
If I had to say whether I am interested or not, maybe I am...
But theater is all Aki-chan ever talks about.
Maybe you are just at a difficult age.
I told you not to treat me like a baby!
Sorry it is a little late.
Do not mind if I do!
By the way, what were you having so much fun talking about?
The landlady is infatuated with theater,
Mayu-chan wanted to get some ice cream by the station,
and Mayu-chan is not interested in theater...
I am not really sure anymore...
You do not have to talk about that!
So basically, she is jealous of theater because the landlady never has time for her, right?
How did you figure it out from that?!
Wait, is that the reason why you said you did not want to be in theater?
Aki-chan loses sight of everything else.
Yeah, she really does love it.
And the club's advisor just came back, too.
Yeah, I am happy that she is motivated again because of that...
But that also means she pays no attention to me at all.
That is why I wish she would not get so absorbed in theater...
A maiden's heart is a complex thing.
We will fill that hole in your heart.
Why are you both doing that?!
The landlady sure is late getting back.
And she just left the shop like that!
When she gets back, I am going to let her have it!
The landlady is not obligated to work here, is she?
Um, I brought this back as a gift.
It is from the place by the station...
Sorry I have not had time to hang out lately.
Let us have ice cream together.
They are like a mother and child.
They look like some goofy couple to me.
in each country, theater is searching for new forms of expression.
We need to polish our acting every day
so we do not fall behind, either.
The results of your studies abroad are pretty amazing.
Studying abroad greatly stimulated my creative urges,
This is the greatest masterpiece of them all.
We will perform this at the culture festival.
And Everyone Is Part of the ABC Tragedy Case File!
If I am chosen to play the heroine in this masterpiece...
Would you like to play the heroine?
Direction 6: After standing one 1.8 meter pole and one 2.7 meter pole straight up until they reached the bottom of the pool, the difference in length above the water's surface was 2:5.
Write how deep the pool is in meters, including the decimal value.
B-But I am a new member, and I do not know anything about acting...
I am a better actress than she is!
Hinako is just a ham actor with no talent or experience!
The point is, this failshrimp cannot play the heroine!
The image I have in mind for the heroine is perfect for Hinako-san.
Yes, like her singing and her voice...
I am sorry I did that to you without warning!
I just wanted you to be my heroine so much...
I am absolutely confident in this script.
I want to make it the perfect production,
And I need your help to do that, Hinako-san!
-Make sure the club journal is published in time Deadline is strict!
-Let us give the advisor a report at least 3 days in advance Sensei, sorry to always keep you waiting
Shopping list -B5 copy paper -Screen tones -Copics Buy?
I cannot believe Hina-chan was picked to play the lead, just like that!
Will I really be able to play the heroine?
That depends on what you do from here, I think.
You mean it depends on how much I practice, right?
Why do not we practice right now?
pretend it is the real show and give it a try!
Wh-When I thought of this as the real show, I got nervous...
A Kind Girl Who Is not Kind
but her movements are still stiff.
I wonder if there is any advice I could offer her...
Next time, A Kind Girl Who Is not Kind.
